pr_title: SONARJAVA-3207 Rule S5547: Cipher algorithms should be robust

timeline.message: SONARJAVA-3208 Deprecate S2278 and S2258 in favor of S5547

timeline.bodyText:
In this check, we did something similar and we used ExpressionsHelper.getConstantValueAsString.  We may want to use it to be consistent.
It would also avoid to trim the quotes at line 74.
timeline.author: quentin-jaquier-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText: I think it's better to remove the assignments for clarity.
